vsParam:
Wow, the parcel is so big!
Is it a gift from someone?

Er. It's from one of my fans.
I'm shocked when I heard that I have a fan club!
After all, Tandrion's pretty face is his only selling point...

It's really touching for someone to go out of
his way to attract others.

However, I think Tandrion would just
throw away the gift.

Hey, your evaluation of me is way too low, don't you think?
I'm not that bad.

Of course I'll give a gift in return,
otherwise it will blemish the Guard's reputation!
Really... I didn't realize that you are so principled.

The reason why I asked you to come is that I want
you to make me a gift using alchemy.
What? Making a gift using alchemy?

Yes. I planned to get a jewel or some pastries,
but I don't have the time to buy them.

Don't you think that the gift is only sincere
if you prepare it yourself... I see, right, [px]?

Oh, thank you so much! You are a big help.
Let's get started...

Wow, you know how to wrap a gift, Tandrion?
And you are so good at it!

Er. After all I give something in return for every gift I receive.
How's that, pretty kawaii, huh?

Yeah. I start to see why you are so popular
among girls.
That's right! I have many good qualities besides my pretty face!

Ha-ha... It would be very good if you can use
this spirit in your work with the guards...
